channel.title: Job Phone Chicago Women Sick Food Music Hiromi Amjad Nokia on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Job Phone Chicago Women Sick Food Music Hiromi Amjad Nokia on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: oh yea.
item.description: This weekend was good. on friday there was a blond redhead show. I was initially a bit scared that they woudn’t represent their recorded music well - but I was wrong. they did a great job. as soon as the women started singing, it was apparent that her talent wasn’t based on some studio tricks. after the concert I went and hung out a bit with morgn and alan. then sleep.
